snippet.title: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://nisamerica.com/yomawari/lost-in-the-dark

A young girl must explore a haunted town and search for her missing memories in order to break the curse placed upon her. She’ll have to rely on only her wits, cunning, and a well-placed hiding spot or two to evade the twisted ghosts that wander the streets.

Coming this Fall.

#Yomawari #LostInTheDark
